snippet.title: Photogeist Albums: Case 1+2 - Update Trailer | Monster Tamer Direct 2024
snippet.description:
The Stayfer River Saga is expanding!

An epic and mysterious adventure awaits Tara Estelar as she continues her investigation in Stayfer River!

Encounter unusual monsters known as Geists, document clues and take photos of the monsters, and engage in combat to unravel the mystery of the town!

It's up to you to decide if Geists are friend...or foe. 

Download the FREE "demo" Case 1 on our itch page!

Links:
itch Page: https://photogeist-albums.itch.io/photogeist-albums

Twitter: https://twitter.com/photogeist_dev

Official Discord: https://discord.gg/NSZsG5J6rs
